content: this hat is worked in the round from the bottom up beginning with a ribbed brim it s a dense knit for added warmth it is designed for an average adult head with a slouchy fit if a less slouchy fit is desired knit less in the plain stockinette portion after the chart and before the beginning of the crown decrease if more slouch is desired knit more in that section if more slouch is added more mc will be needed almost every bit of yarn for the mc was used **if gauge is off that will affect yarn amounts and fit ** **materials** 1 hank each blue sky fibers woolstok tweed 3 5 oz/100 g ea approx 109 yds/100 m 85% fine highland wool 15% donegal in light version #3302 silver birch mc 109 yds/100 m used and #3313 tiger lily cc 15 yds/14 m used or dark version #3311 plum brandy mc 109 yds/100 m used and #3313 tiger lily cc 15 yds/14 m used
